I'm proud that I'm able to provide a healthy alternative to sugary drinks for my family and community.
I own a computer that is suitable for my needs.
i am twenty five years old.

i do not like the beach.

content.text: Hey, I'm 25. What's your age?
I'm also 25. What's your favorite holiday?
My favorite holiday is Thanksgiving. I love to cook for my family and friends. What about you?
I like Halloween. I go to a horror movie marathon with my friends every year to support a local charity.
That's cool. I went to see Taylor Swift in concert with my friend from out of town on my last vacation.
Taylor Swift is awesome. I love her songs. Do you like watermelon?
Yes, I love the sweet and juicy flavor of watermelon. What about you?
I love it too. It's one of my favorite fruits.
Cool. My name is [user 1's name]. It's nice to meet you.
My name is [user 2's name]. It's nice to meet you too.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a dentist.
Oh, that's cool. I'm a night owl who studies radiology.
Really? That's interesting.
Yeah, I'm an introvert. I like to stay in at night and study.
I'm an introvert too. I don't like going to the beach. I'm more of a stay-at-home kind of person.
I know what you mean. I like to stay in and watch movies or play video games.
Me too. I love watching horror movies.
What's your favorite horror movie?
My favorite horror movie is The Conjuring.
That's a good movie. I like it too.
Yeah, it's a classic.
I'm going to a horror movie marathon with my friends to support a local charity.
That's cool. I'm going to see a horror movie at the theater this weekend.
I hope you have fun.
Thanks. You too.
